import axios from"axios";const API_URL="http://localhost:5001/tasks";// Backend URL
export const getTasks=async()=>{const response=await axios.get(API_URL);return response.data;};export const createTask=async task=>{const response=await axios.post(API_URL,task);return response.data;};export const updateTask=async(id,task)=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id),task);return response.data;};export const deleteTask=async id=>{await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id));};
